login.title: Login
login.heading: It is as if you were doing work v1.0
login.instruction: Please login with your work credentials

delayed.title: Get Ready!
delayed.content: Work will start when the progress bar is full!

about.title: About
content: Welcome to It is as if you were doing work!
As you are no doubt very aware, the new machine-learning economy has significantly reduced the demand for human-produced labour, leading to unemployment rates of over 95%.
Although many humans find themselves able to adapt to this post-work era some among you struggle with a sense of ineffectiveness and a lack of productivity. We take this very seriously.
It is as if you were doing work is an application created especially for those humans who feel a need to recapture an appearance of usefulness through traditional human-computer interaction

Please feel free to launch It is as if you were doing work whenever existential concerns about contributing to a larger framework of industry assail you. Consider organising with groups of friends to 'work' with It is as if you were doing work in a larger office setting.
And remember: you are human, you are important.

break.title: Time for a break!
break.p1: It's time for a well-deserved break!
break.p2: Break time is over when the progress bar is full!

breakout.forbidden: You can't play Breakout unless you're on a break!
breakout.title: Take a break!

technologies: SpaceX's Reusable Launch System Development Program
The High Energy Liquid Laser Area Defense System
The Universal Software Radio Peripheral Spec
inspirationWorkSlogans: Be so good they can't ignore you
Work like you don't need the money
There is no substitute for hard work
No one ever drowned in sweat
Embrace the pain, inherit the gain
There is no elevator to success
One person can make a difference
The harder you work, the luckier you get
Do it the right way every day
inspirationalQuotes: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
We can't change the direction of the wind, but Iwecan adjust my sails to always reach my destination.

Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
Our mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
What we think, we become.
What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
Change your thoughts and you change your world.
Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Space is an inspirational concept that allows you to dream big.
Reach for the stars.
A place for everything, everything in its place.
The authentic self is the soul made visible.
From its brilliancy everything is illuminated.
You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
If the world seems cold to you, kindle fires to warm it.
We convince by our presence.
We have it in our power to begin the world over again.
Believe in living today. Not in yesterday, nor in tomorrow.
Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
In oneself lies the whole world and if you know how to look and learn, the door is there and the key is in your hand. Nobody on earth can give you either the key or the door to open, except yourself.
The undertaking of a new action brings new strength.
It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.
The truth is on the march and nothing will stop it.
The ideal life is in our blood and never will be still.
Every heart that has beat strongly and cheerfully has left a hopeful impulse behind it in the world, and bettered the tradition of mankind.
It is only in sorrow bad weather masters us; in joy we face the storm and defy it.
Grant that we may always desire more than we can accomplish.
Create each day anew.
Countless as the sands of the sea are human passions.
Sport is something that is very inspirational for young people.
There is a loftier ambition than merely to stand high in the world. It is to stoop down and lift humankind a little higher.
We must live and create. Live to the point of tears.
Our ideals are our better selves.
It's a moment that I'm after, a fleeting moment, but not a frozen moment.
We are deliberate and afraid of nothing.
Too low they build, who build beneath the stars.

Once I knew only darkness and stillness... my life was without past or future... but a little word from the fingers of another fell into my hand that clutched at emptiness, and my heart leaped to the rapture of living.
One defines oneself by reinvention. To not be like your parents. To not be like your friends. To be yourself. To cut yourself out of stone.
It is in our nature to dance by virtue of the beat of our hearts, the pulse of our blood and the music in our minds.
There are glimpses of heaven to us in every act, or thought, or word, that raises us above ourselves.
Think with your whole body.
Let each person exercise the art they know.
Our mind is our kingdom.
We relish news of our heroes, forgetting that we are extraordinary to somebody too.
And now, this is the sweetest and most glorious day that ever my eyes did see.
We arise full of eagerness and energy, knowing well what achievement lies ahead of us.
Art is an inspirational tool.
Brand is not a product, that's for sure; it's not one item. It's an idea, it's a theory, it's a meaning, it's how you carry yourself. It's aspirational, it's inspirational.
Better to be called something positive and inspirational than something negative.
Anyone who has a passion for what they love to do, and who pursue it, is inspirational.
We must hope when our lives are chronicled, it would be an inspirational story.
If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride - and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
A hero is someone who has given their life to something bigger than themself.
Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.
Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf.
It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
To love means loving the unlovable. To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable. Faith means believing the unbelievable. Hope means hoping when everything seems hopeless.
Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars.
There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

If you always put limit on everything you do, physical or anything else. It will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
We will love the light for it shows us the way, yet we will endure the darkness because it shows us the stars.
When the sun is shining we can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.

When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
The power of imagination makes us infinite.
The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.
You must do the things you think you cannot do.
There is nothing impossible to those who will try.
Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself.
Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow.
Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.
Keep your feet on the ground, but let your heart soar as high as it will. Refuse to be average or to surrender to the chill of your spiritual environment.
In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
If you will see further than others, it will be by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
Keep all special thoughts and memories for lifetimes to come. Share these keepsakes with others to inspire hope and build from the past, which can bridge to the future.
Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!
Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone.
If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.
Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom.
Memories of our lives, of our works and our deeds will continue in others.
Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future.
If a person does not keep pace with their companions, perhaps it is because they hear a different drummer. Let them step to the music which they hear, however measured or far away.
Tomorrow is the most important thing in life. Comes into us at midnight very clean. It's perfect when it arrives and it puts itself in our hands. It hopes we've learned something from yesterday.
Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
With self-discipline most anything is possible.
A champion is someone who gets up when they can't.
Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.
The things that we love tell us what we are.
The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible.
Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.
What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well.
Happiness is the natural flower of duty.
The best way out is always through.
Find out who you are and be that person. That's what your soul was put on this Earth to be. Find that truth, live that truth and everything else will come.
If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
Give light and people will find the way.
When deeds speak, words are nothing.
To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.
Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.
Each day provides its own gifts.
Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
Out of difficulties grow miracles.
The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.
Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell.
Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and humankind the vessel.
When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
Reach for it. Push yourself as far as you can.
The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.
Enthusiasm moves the world.
What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
What great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail?
Everything you want is out there waiting for you to ask. Everything you want also wants you. But you have to take action to get it.
Belief creates the actual fact.
The only journey is the one within.
Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around.
As knowledge increases, wonder deepens.
Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries.
Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge.
Let us dream of tomorrow where we can truly love from the soul, and know love as the ultimate truth at the heart of all creation.
Let every dawn be to you as the beginning of life, and every setting sun be to you as its close.
Yesterday we obeyed kings and bent our necks before emperors. But today we kneel only to truth, follow only beauty, and obey only love.
Every moment and every event of every person's life on earth plants something in their soul.
Learning how to be still, to really be still and let life happen - that stillness becomes a radiance.
Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.
Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help.
Nothing is worth more than this day.
Great hopes make great people.
Ideas shape the course of history.
Do your little bit of good where you are; it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.
We dwell in possibility.
From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life.
Whatever you vividly imagine, ardently desire, sincerely believe, and enthusiastically act upon... must inevitably come to pass!
It seems to me we can never give up longing and wishing while we are thoroughly alive. There are certain things we feel to be beautiful and good, and we must hunger after them.
Love and desire are the spirit's wings to great deeds.
There is nothing stronger in the world than gentleness.
Vitality shows in not only the ability to persist but the ability to start over.

Of all things visible, the highest is the heaven of the fixed stars.

Not on one strand are all life's jewels strung.
The most beautiful thing in the world is, of course, the world itself.
For a gallant spirit there can never be defeat.
Whatever ought to be, can be.
You change your life by changing your heart.
The glow of one warm thought is worth more than money.
Hope is but the dream of those who wake.
Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
If you could only love enough, you could be the most powerful person in the world.
Humankind is made great or little by its own will.
It's inspirational to see someone who is dying smile.
Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
One today is worth two tomorrows.
As people are walking all the time, in the same spot, a path appears.

Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.

It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
If you can dream it, you can do it.
Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.

Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.

Never, never, never give up.

Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
If you're going through hell, keep going.
Well done is better than well said.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.

You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree.
Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.

A goal is a dream with a deadline.
If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.
No bird soars too high if it soars with his own wings.
Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
We aim above the mark to hit the mark.
Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed - there's so little competition.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination.
There's a way to do it better - find it.
The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.
It is very important to know who you are. To make decisions. To show who you are.
Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.
If you think you can do it, you can.
You simply have to put one foot in front of the other and keep going. Put blinders on and plow right ahead.
Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
To be a good loser is to learn how to win.
Don't give up. Don't lose hope. Don't sell out.
There is nothing deep down inside us except what we have put there ourselves.
We make the world we live in and shape our own environment.
The will to succeed is important, but what's more important is the will to prepare.
Never give in and never give up.
Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
Deserve your dream.
They can conquer who believe they can.
Either you will find a way, or you will make one.
You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.

Where there is a will, there is a way. If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it. Pry the door open or, if need be, wedge your foot in that door and keep it open.
Don't think, just do.
You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness.
You have to make it happen.
Always desire to learn something useful.
When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.
Step by step and the thing is done.
Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any. It is wonderful how much may be done if we are always doing.
One finds limits by pushing them.
It's always too early to quit.
Never complain and never explain.
After a storm comes a calm.
Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.

Set your sights high, the higher the better. Expect the most wonderful things to happen, not in the future but right now. Realize that nothing is too good. Allow absolutely nothing to hamper you or hold you up in any way.
You will never win if you never begin.
Whatever you want in life, other people are going to want it too. Believe in yourself enough to accept the idea that you have an equal right to it.
Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.
Be gentle to all and stern with yourself.
When one must, one can.
Wherever you are - be all there.
Many are called but few get up.
Never retreat. Never explain. Get it done and let them howl.
Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.
You must take action now that will move you towards your goals. Develop a sense of urgency in your life.
Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did.
One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.
There is progress whether ye are going forward or backward! The thing is to move!
True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.
Do whatever you do intensely.
Who seeks shall find.
No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one.
The more things you do, the more you can do.
Crave for a thing, you will get it. Renounce the craving, the object will follow you by itself.
Set yourself earnestly to see what you are made to do, and then set yourself earnestly to do it.
To know oneself, one should assert oneself.
To begin, begin.
Don't fight the problem, decide it.
The more we do, the more we can do.
Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose?
Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you.
You never know what motivates you.
Hitch your wagon to a star.
Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
A will finds a way.
You create your opportunities by asking for them.
Big shots are only little shots who keep shooting.
Know or listen to those who know.
Only the educated are free.
Either move or be moved.
Leap, and the net will appear.
The dog that trots about finds a bone.
You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
What is called genius is the abundance of life and health.
The wise does at once what the fool does at last.
If you don't ask, you don't get.
Do not weep; do not wax indignant. Understand.
There is always room at the top.
How do you know you're going to do something, untill you do it?
If you've got a talent, protect it.
To be wholly devoted to some intellectual exercise is to have succeeded in life.
One may miss the mark by aiming too high as too low.
Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.

Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.

Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.
There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
Stay positive and happy. Work hard and don't give up hope. Be open to criticism and keep learning. Surround yourself with happy, warm and genuine people.
A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.
It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
Never stop fighting until you arrive at your destined place - that is, the unique you. Have an aim in life, continuously acquire knowledge, work hard, and have perseverance to realise the great life.
Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency. Consistent hard work leads to success. Greatness will come.
The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and, above all, don't let anyone limit your dreams.
There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
Ideas pull the trigger, but instinct loads the gun.
Details create the big picture.
We're all working together; that's the secret.
There is always space for improvement, no matter how long you've been in the business.
